summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 5, 8, 17 and 20, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between 10th Avenue Northeast and 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to East 45th Street all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7198 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
